entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:07 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Schefferville Airport 07:55 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: ESE 32 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
